% --- Statistical tests LaTeX snippet (auto-generated) ---
% Include in paper with \input{statistical_tests_table.tex}

\begin{table}[t]
\centering
\caption{Statistical comparisons of output reproducibility (EMR) between local and API-hosted models under greedy decoding conditions. Paired $t$-tests and Wilcoxon signed-rank tests are reported with Cohen's $d$ effect sizes and bootstrap 95\% CIs.}
\label{tab:statistical-tests}
\small
\begin{tabular}{llccrrl}
\toprule
Comparison & Task & $n$ & Cohen's $d$ & $t$-test $p$ & Wilcoxon $p$ & Sig. \\
\midrule
LLaMA 3 8B vs. GPT-4 & Extraction (C2 (greedy)) & 30 & 1.64 & 6.9e-10 & 1.6e-05 & $^{***}$ \\
LLaMA 3 8B vs. GPT-4 & Extraction (C3 temp=0.0) & 14 & 1.44 & 1.3e-04 & 3.9e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
LLaMA 3 8B vs. GPT-4 & Summarization (C2 (greedy)) & 30 & 3.06 & 1.8e-16 & 1.6e-06 & $^{***}$ \\
LLaMA 3 8B vs. GPT-4 & Summarization (C3 temp=0.0) & 30 & 2.18 & 1.0e-12 & 2.1e-06 & $^{***}$ \\
Mistral 7B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Extraction (C1 (fixed seed)) & 10 & 2.41 & 3.3e-05 & 3.9e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Mistral 7B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Extraction (C2 (variable seed)) & 10 & 5.68 & 2.3e-08 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Mistral 7B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Extraction (C3 temp=0.0) & 10 & 3.72 & 9.2e-07 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Mistral 7B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Summarization (C1 (fixed seed)) & 10 & 3.81 & 7.4e-07 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Mistral 7B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Summarization (C2 (variable seed)) & 10 & 4.00 & 4.9e-07 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Mistral 7B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Summarization (C3 temp=0.0) & 10 & 2.13 & 8.5e-05 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Gemma 2 9B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Extraction (C1 (fixed seed)) & 10 & 2.64 & 1.6e-05 & 3.9e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Gemma 2 9B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Extraction (C2 (variable seed)) & 10 & 11.66 & 3.9e-11 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Gemma 2 9B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Extraction (C3 temp=0.0) & 10 & 6.64 & 5.9e-09 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Gemma 2 9B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Summarization (C1 (fixed seed)) & 10 & 23.24 & 8.1e-14 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Gemma 2 9B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Summarization (C2 (variable seed)) & 10 & 10.22 & 1.3e-10 & 2.0e-03 & $^{***}$ \\
Gemma 2 9B vs. Claude Sonnet 4.5 & Summarization (C3 temp=0.0) & 10 & $\infty$ & 1.0e+00 & 2.0e-03 & n/a (zero variance) \\
\midrule
Local (LLaMA+Mistral+Gemma) vs API (GPT-4+Claude) & Extraction & 150+74 & 3.19 & 1.4e-27 & 7.3e-36$^\dagger$ & $^{***}$ \\
Local (LLaMA+Mistral+Gemma) vs API (GPT-4+Claude) & Summarization & 150+93 & 3.79 & 8.1e-65 & 2.1e-41$^\dagger$ & $^{***}$ \\
Local (all) vs API (all) & All (Extraction + Summarization) & 300+167 & 3.42 & 1.4e-79 & 3.2e-74$^\dagger$ & $^{***}$ \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\vspace{2pt}
\raggedright\footnotesize
$^{***}p<0.001$, $^{**}p<0.01$, $^{*}p<0.05$. $^\dagger$Mann--Whitney $U$ (independent samples).
\end{table}

% --- Per-model aggregate EMR with bootstrap CIs ---
\begin{table}[t]
\centering
\caption{Per-model aggregate EMR under greedy decoding (C1/C2/C3\_t0) with bootstrap 95\% confidence intervals.}
\label{tab:model-emr-ci}
\small
\begin{tabular}{lcccl}
\toprule
Model & Type & $n$ & Mean EMR & 95\% CI \\
\midrule
Gemma 2 9B & Local & 60 & 1.000 & [1.000, 1.000] \\
Mistral 7B & Local & 60 & 0.878 & [0.818, 0.931] \\
LLaMA 3 8B & Local & 180 & 0.954 & [0.931, 0.975] \\
GPT-4 & API & 107 & 0.282 & [0.221, 0.346] \\
Claude Sonnet 4.5 & API & 60 & 0.064 & [0.031, 0.108] \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\end{table}
